modName: Dwemer Cube - simple a mobile Safe-storage mod
summary: Just a simple safe-storage mod. Mobile to take it with you for your adventures. Its immersive, its lorefriendly!  ...because it's not intel - its Dwemer-Magic inside xD
descriptionHtml:
How the title said - its just a simple lesser power to open a container, to store things from your inventory in it.

I know there many other mods out there, there do pretty much the same thing. But for my opinion there was no one.. just.. simple enough to fit in my game, so i decide to make a mod like this by my self.

And there it is: Dwemer Cube - because with dwemer-magic you can explain anything!

How to start: first of all, there is a Dwemer-Cube-shaped Spelltome. You can craft it at the skyforge under Dwemer-Category - so you will need the Dwemer smithing Perk.
the recepy is not so hard, but not cheap: 20 Ingots of Dwemer-Steel, 8 Ingots of Gold for the edges and 6 flawless sapphires - one for each side.

If you'll 'read' the Cube - it will disappear like any other spelltome too and you will learn the lesser-Power "Dwemer Cube" you can use it so often you want each day.


Requirements: 
Just a legal Copy of Skyrim.

there's really not much more to say about the mod .. how i said - its pretty simple and it works.

its so simple that i translated by my self in English and German.

I'll hope you like this mod for its simplification like i did.

greets.
author: Rikushai
